ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 2 |  | #P_rmyadd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ /\ 1 e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX 1 ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY 1 ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mp3an3 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX 1 ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY 1 ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rmx1 | |- ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> ( A rmX 1 ) = A ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX 1 ) ) = ( ( A rmY N ) x. A ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX 1 ) ) = ( ( A rmY N ) x. A ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_rmy1 | |- ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> ( A rmY 1 ) = 1 ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY 1 ) ) = ( ( A rmX N ) x. 1 ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY 1 ) ) = ( ( A rmX N ) x. 1 ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_frmx | |- rmX : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> NN0 |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX N ) e. NN0 ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_nn0cnd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX N ) e. CC ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_mulid1d | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) x. 1 ) = ( A rmX N ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY 1 ) ) = ( A rmX N ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX 1 ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY 1 ) ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. A ) + ( A rmX N ) ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. A ) + ( A rmX N ) ) ) |
